name: BASIC COMPILER EXAMPLE NUMBER PUZZLE
description:
NUMBER PUZZLE BLASTER : THE PUZZLE GAME THAT TRAINS YOUR MATHEMICAL SKILLS IN A UNIQUE FASHION

SPRITE BASIC COMPILER IS A GAME ENGINE FRAMEWORK WITH MOBILE APPLICATIONS PACKAGING

THIS GAME IS TO SHOW YOU WHAT CAN BE ACHIEVED WITH THIS FRAMEWORK

REVIEW SPRITE BASIC COMPILER GAME ENGINE FROM THE APPS OF SAME DEVELOPER



NUMBER PUZZLE BLASTER is a fast-paced puzzle game that will challenge your calculation skills. Add numbers next to each other in order to get the required sums.

To help you in this real brainstorming, you will have to win power ups and use your slick mind.

To the difference of puzzles where you match colors or objects, this puzzle game uses number combinations to propose a new kind of gameplay.

Help Harry to go from is house, to his school and finally to the circus party through 150+ levels. Discover his journey and show the world how smart you are !

Not recommended for iPhone 4/4S
